question.answer: 'bout 10 feet long ... oh wait, you meant my hair?
I joined theatre rice in order to become a much, much cooler person
I do enjoy some good hiking, running, composing music, writing poems, adventurous spontaneity, and painting the Big C exciting new colors
I really love that song -- you know the one that goes like : Dah dah dum, da dum, dee dee doo, da doo dum. I think that's how it goes.
Yeah, I would like to live to a ripe old age -- or live backwards to being a kid again. Either way works, really.

To die never truly knowing what being in love is like ... and not like the obsessive love, or the love when you think you're in love -- but you're not, but you don't want to hurt the other person's feelings so you say that you are. No none of those imposters -- just the real, real love!
Money? There's no money. Weirdo. Now leave me alone, I have to go purchase an island
Probably Berlisconi. My former Dutch roommate seemed to think so.
If you could be a toothpaste, what toothpaste would you be?
